properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.max-mail-size
properties.description: Setting the answer to the MaxMailSize endpoint.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.storage-path
properties.description: Path where the documents are stored.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.database-file
properties.description: Path to file where the database should be stored.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.http-log-capacity
properties.description: Maxium number of lines to store http log.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.cleantime
properties.description: Scheduled time as cron config string when the DeleteFileJob is run.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.time-to-keep-file
properties.description: Time in seconds how long stored files should be kept.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.time-to-keep-id
properties.description: Time in seconds how long genered ids should be checked not be be produced again.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.logging-path
properties.description: Path of folder where the log files are stored.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.swagger-ui-base-addr
properties.description: Endpoint address used for swagger ui.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.use-first-swagger-base-ui-addr-for-add-attachment
properties.description: If value of swagger-ui-addr should be always used for the answer of the add_Attachment method.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.version
properties.description: Version for the path of the endpoints.

properties.name: gematik.kim.kas.max-attachment-requests
properties.description: Setting the maximum number of requests per user for one attachment.
